name: Dardeep
description:
Dardeep is an arcade game with RPG elements.

A brave miner falls into an endless stone cavern, taking with him only a pickaxe. The only chance to survive
is to dig and find keys to locked doors. What awaits the hero on the path to freedom, when the path to salvation
is not on the surface, but at the very bottom of a very deep cave?

Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics.
- Pumping the hero.
- Random level generation.
